item.description:
the Yale Repertory Theatre is offering a special deal for next thursday's performance of "Lulu."

tickets for the show are $25 each (that's $20 off the regular price), and there is a free pizza party and appletini drink specials at BAR (254 Crown St) starting at 6pm.

call the ticket office at the rep at 203-432-1234 and mention "appletini" to get the special ticket price and get your name put on the list at BAR

also, the first 100 guests at BAR will get a free sampler CD of the new hit Broadway musical "Spring Awakening", and all will be eligible to win a "Spring Awakening" prize package.

the performance begins at 8pm.

your contact for the evening: Jacques Lamarre (the connection, works for Yale rep, will be at BAR and the show) 860-965-9418.
item.name: Thurs. 4/12 - "Lulu" at Yale Rep and Free Pizza at Bar
